description.text: You greatly enhance the ability of the subjects to communicate hidden messages to each other. Each target gains a +10 competence bonus on Bluff checks to send secret message to other recipients. Others using opposed Sense Motive checks to decipher these messages receive a â€“5 penalty. All subjects affected by the spell must share a language to be able to pass messages.
